short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Select mainnet transaction hash and view it on various popular Ethereum blockchain explorers

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: It allows you to select a transaction hash anywhere on the page, and easily open up it the most popular Ethereum explorers like Etherscan, Bloxy, Tenderly and Ethtxn.info
